<@Compendium[sfrpg.rules.aKqRtg165rAly1Cc]{Poisons}

Track the progress in the details tab in "Base Value". 0; Healthy, 3; Dead.

To keep the affliction type a secret, renaming the item is suggested. This does not prevent the player from looking at the details tab to learn the affliction type.

@Compendium[sfrpg.equipment.H2CgQu3Iq14Lf4jZ]{Strychnine}

Type poison (injury); Save Fortitude DC 20
Track Dexterity (special); Frequency 1/round for 4 rounds
Effect Progression track is Healthy—Stiffened—Immobile—Dead.
Cure 2 consecutive saves

Modifiers currently do not effect Ability DCs

Dexterity Poison Track

Healthy—Stiffened—Immobile—Dead

Stiffened

The victim loses her Dexterity bonus to her Armor Class, and she can’t take reactions.

Immobile

The victim is helpless and can take only purely mental actions.

Dead

The victim dies.
